mdRecord.dcterms:title: Law School Class of 1924
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Holsinger's Studio (Charlottesville, Va.)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Those pictured include: Edmund M. Wilson, Millard H. Patterson, Hawthorne D. Battle, Charles C. Carlin, Jr., John F. Galleher, William R. Seward, Herman L. Bennett, James R. V. Daniel, John S. Carroll, Collins Denny, Jr., Meredith E. Watkins, Edward H. Rowe, Jr., Bolling C. Stanley, Leslie D. Dawson, Garland R. Hubbard, Donald W. Shriver, Douglas A. Robertson, Nelson Fell, Orval R. Davis, John A. Richards, William Q. de Funiack, Richard D. Gilliam, Jr., Hugh S. Cumming, Jr., Littleton M. Wickham, Martin K. Fulk, William M. Neal, Hugh B. Marsh, Armstead M. Covington, Samuel A. Reinach, Jr., John T. Baxter, John A. Slagen, Lucien M. Abbot, Marshall T. Bohannon, Alpheus W. Embry, Frank Talbott, Jr., Theodore J. Amelson, Manley P. Caldwell, William V. Frazier, Jr., Charles S. Valentine, William S. D. Woods, Richard R. Florance, Jr., Charles E. A. Knight, Stoner M. Scott, Charles N. Hulvey, Samuel R. Cheek Jr. Also pictured: School of Law faculty members George B. Eager, Jr., William H. Lile, Dean Ribble, Charles A. Graves.
